Table of Contents

Interface IRuleConditionRepository

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Repositories
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Repository interface for managing rule conditions. Provides methods for condition management, querying, and validation within the rule engine context.

public interface IRuleConditionRepository : IRepository<RuleCondition>
Inherited Members
IRepository<RuleCondition>.GetAllAsync(CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.GetByIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.GetWhereAsync(Expression<Func<RuleCondition, bool>>, CancellationToken)

IRepository<RuleCondition>.AnyAsync(Expression<Func<RuleCondition, bool>>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.CountAsync(CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.CountWhereAsync(Expression<Func<RuleCondition, bool>>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.InsertAsync(RuleCondition, CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.UpdateAsync(RuleCondition, CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.DeleteAsync(RuleCondition, CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.DeleteByIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.InsertOrUpdateAsync(RuleCondition, CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.InsertAllAsync(IEnumerable<RuleCondition>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.UpdateAllAsync(IEnumerable<RuleCondition>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<RuleCondition>.DeleteAllAsync(CancellationToken)

Remarks

This interface defines the contract for data access operations related to RuleCondition entities. It ensures that business logic remains decoupled from persistence concerns and promotes efficient data handling, especially for low-resource environments.

Methods

DeleteByRuleIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)

Deletes all rule conditions associated with a specific rule.

Task<int> DeleteByRuleIdAsync(int ruleId, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

ruleId int

The unique identifier of the parent rule.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<int>

The number of rule conditions deleted.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if ruleId is less than or equal to 0.

ValidateConditionAsync(RuleCondition, CancellationToken)

Validates if a rule condition's configuration is syntactically and semantically correct.

Task<bool> ValidateConditionAsync(RuleCondition condition, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

condition RuleCondition

The RuleCondition entity to validate.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<bool>

Exceptions
